title: Voter Registration
report: Contact the Maricopa County Democratic Party at https://www.maricopadems.org/ or (602)-298-0503 for volunteer opportunities. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Vote in the Primary
report: If you are on the Early Vote list, be looking for your mail-in ballot. And, return it within 48 hours

title: Your LD
description: Find your Legislative District and volunteer.
report: Go to https://azredistricting.org/districtlocator/ and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find out how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Support Sinema
report: We can send a Democratic Senator to Congress when we help to elect Krysten Sinema. Go to https://kyrstensinema.com/ and help-give money, give time, give support

title: Vote in the Primary
report: If you are on the Early Vote list, be looking for your mail-in ballot. And, return it within 48 hours

title: Vote in the Primary
report: If you are on the Early Vote list, be looking for your mail-in ballot. And, return it within 48 hours
